name: UNITED STATES TELECOM ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Provisions in budget reconciliation legislation related to broadband.
Issues related to combatting illegal robocalls; FY22 National Defense Authorization Act; and the Bipartisan Infrastructure Investment & Jobs Act and related proposals.
Issues related to combatting illegal robocalls and broadband/infrastructure.
United States Innovation & Competition Act; HR 7598-Robocall Trace Back Enhancement Act; HR 678-the Phone Act; and HR 7900-National Defense Authorization Act.
